page.title: 19LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: {LEISURE AND RECREATION} For leisure and recreation lots of people in Pershore play sports. {Racquet}sports are popular and field sports such as{cricket and football. } People enjoy watching television and hiring video films. {Snooker}is popular and played at pubs and clubs in the area. Men and women enjoy {skittles}and leagues exist locally. {Darts}is popular and{dominoes and {cribbage (a card game)}are played again in pubs. The river attracts {canoeists and riverboats, angling}is very popular. The river is dangerous and swimming is not advised. There is a{swimming pool with a sports centre attached. There is a current vogue for keep fit and body building which attracts both sexes. Children are provided with a{play park}close to the Abbey Park Estate.
